sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"电影"之意。
means: cinema与the连用指(上映的)电影，电影工业；可指电影院；在英国与the连用还可指电影艺术。
film ： 指电影、影片，普通用词。
movie ： 美国英语中的口语用词。
picture ： 从原义指银幕或电视屏幕上的图像引申指影片。

sentence.Network_en: The movie sees Burton psychoanalysing Firth to cure him of his depression.
sentence.Network_cn: 在电影中伯顿对弗思进行了精神分析，想要治愈他的抑郁症。

sentence.Network_en: This could be the feel-good movie of the autumn.
sentence.Network_cn: 这可以称得上是今秋令人赏心悦目的影片了。

sentence.Network_en: If you're a Billy Crystal fan, you'lllove this movie.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你是比利·克里斯托的影迷，你会喜爱这部影片。

encyclopedia.content: 简明英汉词典 movie ['mu:vi] n. 电影美国传统词典[双解] movie mov. ie AHD:[m›“v¶] D.J.['mu:vi:] K.K.['muvi] n.（名词） A sequence of photographs projected onto a screen with sufficient rapidity as to create the illusion of motion and continuity. 电影：一组连续的照片被投影到屏幕上并以极快的速度依次放映使之产生连续性和动态的视觉 A connected cinematic narrative represented in this

example.ex: In the first movie Tony Curtis ever made he played a grocery clerk.
example.tran: 托尼·柯蒂斯在其首部电影里，扮演了一个食品杂货店店员。

entry.def: You can talk about the movies when you are talking about seeing a movie in a movie theater.

example.ex: He took her to the movies.

means.word_mean: 1. a form of entertainment that enacts a story by a sequence of images giving the illusion of continuous movement;

sentences.sentence: "they went to a movie every Saturday night"

Sentence.sentence: The movies were widely predicted to drive live theater out of the marketplace, but they didn't, because theater turned out to have qualities movies could not reproduce.
The movies were widely predicted to drive live theater out of the marketplace, but they didn't, because theater turned out to have qualities movies could not reproduce.
Equally, TV was supposed to replace movies but, again, did not.
Disaster movies often portray catastrophes that destroy, or at least threaten to destroy earth's entire population.
Hollywood movies usually have an unexpected, dramatic impact on real-life arguments.
The ruling would be in Bowman's favor if the case were argued in a Hollywood movie.

sentences.en: This movie really catches the flavour of New York.
sentences.cn: 这部影片真正抓住了纽约的特色。

sentences.en: He is going to the movies.

jushi.chinese: 这部影片真正抓住了纽约的特色。

jushi.english: He is going to the movies.
